name: Whimsical Navigation Screen
description: A playful mobile navigation screen with a focus on visual cues and a light, airy aesthetic.

atoms.name: Pill Button
atoms.description: A rounded button with a gradient background, used for primary actions.
atoms.css: background: linear-gradient(to right, #FF9933, #FF6600); border-radius: 9999px; color: white; padding: 8px 24px; font-weight: 600; border: none;

atoms.name: Bold Heading
atoms.description: A large, bold heading used for primary information.

atoms.name: Circular Avatar
atoms.description: A simple circular avatar with initials.
atoms.css: width: 32px; height: 32px; border-radius: 50%; background-color: #E0E0E0; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; color: #666666; font-size: 12px;

atoms.name: Rounded Container
atoms.description: A container with rounded corners and a subtle shadow.

code.css: .container { background-color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 24px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08); padding: 16px; } .pill-button { background: linear-gradient(to right, #FF9933, #FF6600); border-radius: 9999px; color: white; padding: 8px 24px; font-weight: 600; border: none; }
code.tailwind: Not applicable due to unique visual elements.

avoid_for: UIs that need to convey seriousness or authority
Situations where accessibility is paramount (due to color choices)
